mapper.sql: id, org_id, number, name, type, plat, send_store_id, refund_store_id, link_man, mobile, merchant_code, gmt_create, gmt_modified, creator, modifier, state
mapper.insert:
select nextval('nros_channel_id_seq')
insert into nros_channel (id, org_id, number, name, type, plat, send_store_id, refund_store_id, link_man, mobile, merchant_code, gmt_create, gmt_modified, creator, modifier, state ) values (#{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{orgId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{number,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{type,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{plat,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sendStoreId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{refundStoreId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{linkMan,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{mobile,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{merchantCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{gmtCreate,jdbcType=DATE}, #{gmtModified,jdbcType=DATE}, #{creator,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{modifier,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{state,jdbcType=CHAR} )
mapper.select:
select
from nros_channel tc where 1=1
and tc.type = #{channelDO.type}
and tc.name like concat('%',#{channelDO.name},'%')
mapper.update:
update nros_channel
number = #{number,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
type = #{type,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
plat = #{plat,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
send_store_id = #{sendStoreId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
refund_store_id = #{refundStoreId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
link_man = #{linkMan,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
mobile = #{mobile,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
merchant_code = #{merchantCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
gmt_create = #{gmtCreate,jdbcType=DATE},
gmt_modified = #{gmtModified,jdbcType=DATE},
creator = #{creator,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
modifier = #{modifier,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
state = #{state,jdbcType=CHAR},
where org_id = #{orgId,jdbcType=BIGINT}
